channel.title: Philosophy on Ahmed's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Philosophy on Ahmed's Notes

item.title: Are we free ?
item.description: At the outset, I have chosen to write this in order to treat of a subject of no small interest, and if I could point out the obvious in this kind of chronicle, it may be of course that I didn’t choose of my own free will to begin writing this, it may be in fact that I had no choice in the matter at all. To help me decide whether I did or didn’t choose to write this, I must clarify further.
